Happy Halloween! Get ready to treat yourself with WHUK Halloween Special Offer on VPS.

WHUK (Webhosting UK Com Ltd.), a renowned web hosting company in the UK since 2001, offers professional grade VPS hosting service over Dell hardware hosted in Tier IV datacenter facility.

With our latest promo on VPS Hosting, our entire range of plans have evolved into more affordable and value for money proposition! Here's what you can avail through the latest promotion.

Use Halloween Discount Code - "SPOOKY25" to Get 25% OFF on VPS Hosting Plans!
Click to expand...

This is a limited time period offer and ends on Wednesday 31 October 2018, 11.59pm BST. So hurry before the offer ends.

If you wish to try our VPS with cPanel/WHM control panel, you are most welcome to sign up for our Linux VPS Basic Plan which costs only £0.99 for the First Month.
Click to expand...

Initiate a LIVE CHAT with one of our friendly sales advisor to avail exclusive benefits on these VPS servers!
Click to expand...
